product_overview: Chamos Barber App is an integrated management system tailored for barbershops in Chile, blending Venezuelan cultural elements. It streamlines customer bookings, sales processing with POS, staff attendance tracking, and administrative oversight through an intuitive dashboard and AI-enhanced customer service.
core_goals: Enable customers to conveniently book appointments by selecting services, barbers, and real-time available time slots.
Provide an efficient, user-friendly Point of Sale system for appointment and walk-in sales with receipt generation and cash flow management.
Facilitate accurate staff attendance tracking through GPS-validated smartphone check-ins to ensure presence at the shop.
Offer shop owners comprehensive analytical tools via an admin dashboard for managing sales, staff, scheduling, and financial reporting.
Incorporate an AI assistant to improve customer service by supporting booking processes and answering common inquiries.
key_features: Appointment Booking: Multi-service selection, barber choice, real-time slot availability, and WhatsApp notification integration.
Point of Sale (POS) System: Sales processing, thermal receipt printing, daily cash flow management, and support for multiple payment methods.
Staff Attendance System: Mobile check-in/out with GPS validation and administrative monitoring of punctuality and presence.
Admin Dashboard: Real-time sales and booking data, service and pricing management, shift and holiday scheduling, financial reporting, and commissions tracking.
AI Assistant: Conversational interface integrated with a knowledge base to assist customers in bookings and provide information about shop services and policies.
OneSignal Notification Integration: Push notifications for barbers and customers to enhance communication and reminders.
user_flow_summary: Customers browse available services and barbers, then select preferred service, barber, date, and time slot before confirming booking.
Upon appointment or walk-in, the POS system processes the sale, prints receipts, and updates daily cash flow records.
Barbers use their smartphones to check in and out of shifts with GPS validation, and admins monitor attendance data via the dashboard.
Shop owners and administrators use the dashboard for sales tracking, staff management, service configurations, and financial oversight.
The AI assistant interacts with customers through a conversational interface to facilitate bookings and handle FAQs.
Push notifications are sent via OneSignal to customers and barbers for appointment reminders and updates.
validation_criteria: Booking system correctly reflects real-time availability and processes appointments without errors.
POS transactions complete successfully with accurate receipt generation and cash flow updates.
Staff check-in/out times are validated via GPS and properly recorded in the system.
Admin dashboard displays current, accurate analytics for sales, staff attendance, and configurations.
AI assistant responds accurately and helpfully to booking requests and common customer questions.
Push notifications are reliably delivered to intended recipients with timely appointment reminders.
